page.title: 04Childrens fashions of 1985
page.content: Baggy clothes are very popular,an exception being skirts.These are often tight with splits.Pastel shades are in,and so are big roses all over.The creased look is very{fashionable}as are faded jeans.Batwing sleeves and white jackets can be worn with every thing along with pastel canvas boots. Another {fashion}boot is pumplike,but goes right up to the ankle and laces up to a bow. A V-neck back can make an already {fashionable}top the height of{fashion} along with off the shoulder and slit necks.All in all most of these fashions travel down to a young age, sometimes an 8 year old will be seen parading with a leather tie and permed hair. Any big and burly earring are in, which just about somes up {fashion}BIG and BURLY!
